item.title: You Pay Too Much For Phone Service
item.description: A recent study reveals that a majority of cellphone and landline users spend more than they should on their phone services, often significantly exceeding reasonable costs. This overpayment can be as high as $3 per minute for landlines and $3 overall for cell phones. While it’s easy to assume this doesn’t apply to you, it’s worth examining your phone usage closely. Have you analyzed your phone bills recently? The results might surprise you.
